title: Process a New Tenant Move-In
description: A new tenant has signed a lease and is ready to move in. The property manager must handle the move-in process.

tasks.description: Collect the first month's rent and the full security deposit from the new tenant before handing over the keys.
tasks.expected_outcome: All move-in funds are collected and recorded.

tasks.description: Conduct a move-in inspection with the tenant, documenting the condition of the unit on a move-in checklist which both parties sign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The property's initial condition is formally documented to avoid security deposit disputes later.

tasks.description: Provide the tenant with keys and a welcome packet containing important information like emergency contacts and community rules.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tenant is successfully moved in and has all necessary information.
